definition: any of numerous plants having stinging hairs that cause skin irritation on contact (especially of the genus Urtica or family Urticaceae), cause annoyance in
details:
noun
- any of numerous plants having stinging hairs that cause skin irritation on contact (especially of the genus Urtica or family Urticaceae)
verb
- cause annoyance in
= synonyms: rag
- sting with or as with nettles and cause a stinging pain or sensation
= synonyms: urticate
